meanings.definition: A short, quick blast or gust of air or smoke.
meanings.sent1: The wind carried tiny puffs of smoke from the chimney.
meanings.sent2: She blew out puffs of air to cool her soup.
meanings.sent3: The dragon sneezed, sending puffs of smoke everywhere!
meanings.sent4: The clouds looked like fluffy puffs of cotton in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The magician made colorful puffs of smoke appear out of thin air.

meanings.definition: A light, fluffy pastry or dessert.
meanings.sent1: The bakery displayed fresh puffs filled with cream.
meanings.sent2: She enjoyed the sweet taste of the chocolate puff.
meanings.sent3: The puffs on the plate disappeared in seconds at the party.
meanings.sent4: The chef created a masterpiece with layers of delicate pastry puffs.
meanings.sent5: The warm apple puff melted in her mouth with each bite.

meanings.definition: A soft, round mass or shape.
meanings.sent1: The kitten curled up into a cozy puff of fur.
meanings.sent2: The clouds formed fluffy white puffs in the sky.
meanings.sent3: The pillow was so fluffy, it felt like resting on a cloud puff.
meanings.sent4: She picked up a small puff of cotton from the ground.
meanings.sent5: The dandelion released its seeds in a gentle puff of air.

meanings.definition: To emit or give off puffs of air or smoke.
meanings.sent1: The old train puffs steam as it chugs along the tracks.
meanings.sent2: The teapot puffs out steam when it's boiling.
meanings.sent3: The tired hiker puffs heavily as he reaches the mountain peak.
meanings.sent4: The chimney puffs smoke into the clear blue sky.
meanings.sent5: The locomotive puffs loudly as it pulls the heavy cargo.

meanings.definition: To swell or expand in a rounded shape.
meanings.sent1: The dough puffs up in the oven to become golden brown.
meanings.sent2: Her cheeks puffed out when she blew up the balloon.
meanings.sent3: The frog puffs itself up to appear bigger to its predators.
meanings.sent4: The balloon puffs out as more air is blown into it.
meanings.sent5: The pastry dough puffs beautifully as it bakes to perfection.
